name: BONK (itch) (edvinspace)
description:
Have you got what it takes to collide into those pesky colorful objects? There is a catch though, you can only safely do it if you are the same color as the object you smash into... Can you survive the waves?

This is the first game complete game that I have made and published.  It is a short little game and there are many things that could be improved, but I am proud of the result and I have learnt a lot in the process.  Try it out and feel free to share your thoughts :) 

If you are interest in keeping up to date what I'm doing you can find me at my website: edvin.space

Credits

Title music: From 5 Chiptunes (Action) pack by Juhani Junkala
Game music: Enchanted Tiki 86 by cynicmusic.com 

Fonts: Exo2 and Montserrat
